channel.description: Recent content in Ios on IT Blog

item.title: iOS Tips
item.description: Initial configuration Settings Accounts & Passwords -> iCloud -> enable Mail, Contacts, Calendars and Notes Contacts -> Sort Order and Display Order -> First, Last Maps -> Preferred transportation type -> Walking Messages -> enable iMessage and Send as SMS Wallet & Apple Pay -> Add Credit or Debit Card Camera -> Record Video -> set quality Display & Brightness -> Raise to Wake -> disable Clock World Clock -> Add Moscow, Seattle, Montreal, Tbilisi Bedtime -> Enable for weekdays

item.title: iOS Apps
item.description: iPad + iPhone Games Steam Mobile Internet Google Chrome Gmail - Email by Google Messengers Telegram Messenger Skype Viber Messenger Messenger Hangouts Slack Cloud Storage Google Drive â€“ online backup Google Docs Google Sheets Dropbox Misc The Weather Network Google Maps - GPS Navigation Tabata Stopwatch Pro - Tabata Timer and HIIT Timer Asana: organize tasks & work Adobe Acrobat Reader Books Bookmate.
